resources.string: Talk to your DESFire Card
Format the PICC

Formatting the PICC will delete all applications and files on the PICC and releases all storage space back to factory settings.\n The settings of the Master Application are not reset so if you changed the default Master Application Key and key settings these changes will remain.
WARNING: The app will IMMEDIATELY FORMAT the PICC when attached without any further confirmation !\n\n You will loose any existing applications and files on the PICC without recovery !

Formatting the PICC will release all storage space back to factory settings.
 The settings of the Master Application are not reset so if you changed the default Master Application Key and/or key settings these changes will remain.

 The app will authenticate with the DEFAULT Master Application Key first to run the format PICC command.
Setup a test environment
For testing the features of the DesfireEv3 class this activity will prepare the PICC with all necessary application and files

WARNING: The app will IMMEDIATELY run all setups when attached without any further confirmation !\n This includes a FORMAT of the PICC - you will loose any existing applications and files on the PICC without recovery !

More Information about the application and file creations:
 1) The app will FORMAT the PICC so the complete PICC memory is available.
 2) The app will create a new application with applicationID A1A2A3. The app will have 5 AES based application keys. There are no restrictions on file and directory handling (default settings).
 3) In the new application some files are created with these file numbers and access rights (R & W 1, CAR 2, R 3, W 4):
 00 Standard File, 256 file size, communication mode Plain
 01 Standard File, 256 file size, communication mode MACed
 02 Standard File, 256 file size, communication mode Full enciphered
 03 Backup File, 32 file size, communication mode Plain
 04 Backup File, 32 file size, communication mode MACed
 05 Standard File, 32 file size, communication mode Full enciphered
 06 Value File, communication mode Plain
 07 Value File, communication mode MACed
 08 Value File, communication mode Full enciphered
 09 Linear Record file, 32 record size, 3 maximum number of records, communication mode Plain
 10 Linear Record file, 32 record size, 3 maximum number of records, communication mode MACed
 11 Linear Record file, 32 record size, 3 maximum number of records, communication mode Full enciphered
 12 Cyclic Record file, 32 record size, 4 maximum number of records, communication mode Plain
 13 Cyclic Record file, 32 record size, 4 maximum number of records, communication mode MACed
 14 Cyclic Record file, 32 record size, 4 maximum number of records, communication mode Full enciphered
 

The PICC will be formatted immediately after tapping without any further confirmation, the PICC is authenticated with DEFAULT DES Master Application KEY
Personalize the PICC
Changes the application keys to individual ones including the Master Application key
WARNING: The app will IMMEDIATELY run all personalizing steps when attached without any further confirmation !

More Information about the application and file creations:

 For changing the application keys from DEFAULT to CHANGED or CHANGED to DEFAULT:
 1) select the application with applicationID A1A2A3
 2) authenticate with Application Master key = key number 00 (AES DEFAULT)
 3) change the application keys Read & Write Access, Change Access Rights, Read Access and Write Access rights (key numbers 01..04)
 4) change the Application Master key (key number 00)

 For changing the Master Application key from DEFAULT to CHANGED or CHANGED to DEFAULT:
 5) select the Master Application with applicationId 000000
 6) authenticate with Master Application key = key number 00 (DES DEFAULT)
 7) change the Master Application key value

 For changing the Master Application key from DES DEFAULT to AES DEFAULT:
 8) select the Master Application with applicationId 000000
 9) authenticate with Master Application key = key number 00 (DES DEFAULT)
 10) change the Master Application key from DES DEFAULT to AES DEFAULT

 Note: this is a one way option, with this app you cannot change the Master Application key back to a DES key, use my app MifareDesfireEv3MasterkeyToDesNFCJLib for this task.
